product_name: Shelf Road Climbing: A Complete Guide
long_description: . Author: Bob D'Antonio. Softcover; 256 pages; color photographs and maps. K. Daniels Associates; copyright 2011. Colorful photographs chart individual routes, and overview maps help orient you to the climbing area. Includes directions, information on local lodging and camping and a brief overview of the history of the area.
short_description: Shelf Road Climbing: A Complete Guide takes you through the spectacular high-desert crags with captivating views of snowcapped peaks.
